title: Noam CHOMSKY: Why Does Green Mean Yes and Red Mean No? #noamchomsky #language  #practicalwisdom
description: In this insightful video, renowned linguist Noam Chomsky answers the fascinating question of why the color green universally signifies "yes" and red signifies "no." Drawing on his vast expertise in language and cognitive science, Chomsky explores the historical, cultural, and psychological factors that have influenced this widespread color coding.
